name: Pitch Deck Design Template
description:
Pitch Deck Template

by hanihusam


  • Do you struggle with giving presentations? 
  • Is your presentation file boring and lengthy? 
  • Do you require a reference in order to make an interesting presentation?


This pitch deck template is for you. You can edit and customize as you need. This is a FREE LICENSE version. You can use it for personal purpose only. It's all yours.
